amendment.description: To limit the total number of aliens, including spouses and children, granted employment-based legal permanent resident status to 650,000 during any fiscal year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4131 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 152.

action.text: Amendment SA 4131 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S5141-5146; text: CR S5141) To limit the total number of aliens, including spouses and children, granted employment-based legal permanent resident status to 650,000 during any fiscal year.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4131 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 152.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4131 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 152.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4131 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
